title: Understanding the Sum Function
text: To sum a column of numbers in a spreadsheet, you need to use a specific function or button designed for this purpose. This function automatically adds up all the numbers in the selected column.

title: Locating the Sum Button
text: Most spreadsheet applications have a sum button that looks like the Greek letter sigma (Σ). This button is usually located in the toolbar or under the 'Formulas' tab.

hintAnswer: Select the column and click the sum button.
title: Steps to Sum a Column
text: To sum a column, first select the entire column you want to add up. Then, click on the sum button (Σ) in the toolbar or under the 'Formulas' tab.
choices: Select the column and click the sum button
click sum and enter each cell
